flickering light and passing shadows (idiom)/blurred scenery/cursory/superficial
quiet, silent, and lonely/far and indistinct/gone without a trace
separated by a generation/a lifetime ago
the passage of the years/the flow of time
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
pressing/urgent/poverty-stricken/destitute

deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
